description:
<p><strong>A permanent vacancy has arisen in the Treatment Centre for a staff nurse. </strong></p>
<p><strong>We are seeking to employ an enthusiastic, motivated individual to join our health care team on a busy day surgery unit. We are a highly motivated team who enjoy developing and supporting staff whilst driving towards excellence in quality and safety of patient care. Applicants must possess excellent communication skills and willing to learn new skills in this diverse environment.     </strong></p>

hiringOrganization.name: Mid Cheshire Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: Nurse - Treatment Centre
